snippet.textDisplay: I found this game to be amazing at first glance, but the repetitiveness eventually got to me.  I'd still recommend it to all, but I don't think it should be labeled as a "great" game.

snippet.textDisplay: I personally had to play the game in short bursts. Otherwise I found it very unique and charming, though I actually thought the story was pretty predictable (no idea if I'm the only one who saw everything coming a couple hours in lol). Just a fun and beautiful way to test your brain really.
snippet.textOriginal: I personally had to play the game in short bursts. Otherwise I found it very unique and charming, though I actually thought the story was pretty predictable (no idea if I'm the only one who saw everything coming a couple hours in lol). Just a fun and beautiful way to test your brain really.

snippet.textDisplay: There are 135 puzzles + 26 (or was it 27?)free downloadable puzzles. It sure kept my attention for a while, plus it's a good game to share with friends.
